TITLE: Capstone
DEF: A course that builds on an entire program and signifies its succesful completion
TASK: The Capstone pattern incorporates an integrative course that utilizes knowledge and skills accumulated throughout a program. This course enables learners to demonstrate mastery and readiness for post-educational objectives. The challenge lies in encapsulating the program's breadth and depth while offering an authentic competency assessment. The pattern flourishes when capstone projects have explicit objectives, embody real-world contexts, and include structured feedback and reflective elements.
